title: As a user I want the MN insurance flags set
custom_steps: The MN insurance flag as well as the effective date need to be set, this should be done by the Highmark batch.

title: As a user I want the MJ insurance flags set
custom_steps:
The mj insurance flag as well as the effective date need to be set.

There should be a batch which runs on opening day and sets the flags.

All MJ transactions should check if they are changing roster status and set the MJ flag appropriately.

If the MJ flag is set, the MN flag should be unset and mn effective date should be updated.

title: As a BOC admin I want to be able to Generate the Draft Order for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_pre-draft

Generate Draft Order Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/3.+Generating+Draft+order+rules

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking edit on the "Pre Draft" tab will put the screen into Edit mode, per the wireframe.
* Anytime the page is in Edit mode, there is a "Generate Draft Order" button in addition to the Cancel button and Save button. 
* Clicking "Generate Draft Order" will first save any edits made by the user, including running a required field and formatting check. Once that passes, the system will generate the Draft Order for the entire 40 rounds of the Draft based on the rules, and the entries made by the users.
* A blue notification will be thrown "The Draft Order has been generated".
* Once the Draft Order has been generated, the user is navigated to the Draft Order tab to view the updated order.

title: As a user I want to be able to view the Draft Order tab for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_order
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_order


Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Draft Order" tab on the Rule 4 Dashboard.
* Clicking on the Draft Order tab will load the Rule 4 Draft Order for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft. 
* The screen will match the wireframe. 
* The Round Listing will be populated according to the rules found here: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/2.+Generating+Round+Listing+rules
* By default, the Round 1 Draft Order will be loaded.  
* The Comments box only displays if comments have been saved on the Pre-Draft screen.

title: As a user I want to be able to load a different round to view in the Draft Order tab for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_order

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Within the Round Listing, the user should be able to click on one of the rounds, and have the table to the right update with the complete list of picks contained in that round. 
* Before the Draft Order is generated, this is just based on the default draft order with no supplemental picks. 
* Once the Draft Order has been generated, this should reflect any changes made by the users.
* By default, the Round 1 Draft Order will be loaded, but the user should be able to easily and quickly move from round to round.
* Whatever round is currently being displayed will have the blue selected background color and the arrow icon will be shift to the right.

title: As a user I want to be alerted if the Draft Order is out of sync with the Pre-Draft screen for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_order

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking on the Draft Order tab will load the stored Rule 4 Draft Order for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft. 
* If changes to the Pre-Draft screen have been saved and the Draft Order NOT regenerated OR manually overridden, then a blue notification will display. See Messages #2

title: As a BOC Admin user I want to be able to Manually Override the Draft Order tab for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_pre-draft

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Draft+Order+tab+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the "Draft Order" tab, the BOC Admin user will see a "Manual Override" button.
* Clicking this button will reload the screen in edit mode. 
* The user will be able to use drag and drop to reorder the Rounds. 
* The user will be able to use drag and drop to reorder the Picks within each Round.
* The user will be able to manually rename any of the Rounds.
* The user will be able to manually remove any of the Rounds.
* The user will be able to manually add additional Rounds. 
* The user will be able to manually add additional Picks to individual Rounds. 
* The user will be able to adjust the picking Org and Pick Type for individual Picks. 
* Whenever the tab is in edit mode, there is a "Save" button and a "Cancel" button. 
* Clicking "Save" will run a required field check and display any messages necessary. Once the required field/formatting check has passed, the system will store the changes and display a successful save message.
* Clicking "Cancel" will ask the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes. If they confirm, the system reloads the form in view mode and no changes are stored. The Draft Order is not marked as manually overwritten. If they do not confirm, the system returns the user to the screen in edit mode with their changes still visible.

title: As a BOC admin I want the approval of a trade that contains a change to a Competitive Balance pick to update the Pre-Draft tab for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_order

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Pre-Draft++tab+-+Data+Discovery


Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a Competitive Balance pick is included in an Outright Trade, then on Approval of the trade, the system should update the "Traded To" value for the associated pick on the Pre-Draft screen.
